title: User Registration/Login
body: As a new user, I want to register/login so I can access my dashboard.

title: Create Athlete Profile
body: As an athlete, I want to create a profile with my bio and sport type.

title: Update Athlete Profile Info
body: As a returning user, I want to update my profile info anytime.

title: Add/Edit NIL Deals
body: As an athlete, I want to add/edit deals with brand name, amount, and dates.

title: Upload NIL Contract Files
body: As an athlete, I want to upload my NIL contract files to the deal.

title: Track Deliverables with Due Dates
body: As an athlete, I want to track deliverables with deadlines and status.

title: Show Overdue Deliverables
body: As a user, I want to see overdue deliverables highlighted in red.

title: Connect Strava Account
body: As an athlete, I want to connect my Strava account securely.

title: Show Ride Stats and Feed
body: As a user, I want to see a feed of my latest rides and stats.

title: Display Milestones in Active Deals
body: As a brand, I want to view ride milestones hit during a contract period.

title: Schedule Content for NIL Deals
body: As an athlete, I want to schedule posts tied to deals.

title: Set Deliverable Reminders
body: As an athlete, I want reminders for upcoming deadlines.

title: AI Post Suggestions
body: As a user, I want an AI to suggest post captions and hashtags.

title: Log NIL Payments
body: As an athlete, I want to log payments per deal with method and date.

title: Show Income by Brand/Category
body: As a user, I want to see total income by brand and category.

title: Export Tax Summary
body: As a user, I want to export my income for tax prep.

title: Connect Google Analytics
body: As an athlete, I want to connect GA4 to see site traffic.

title: Track UTM Links
body: As a user, I want to track UTM links for brand campaigns.

title: Display Traffic & ROI for Sponsors
body: As a brand, I want to see ROI from athlete campaigns.

title: Create Public Athlete Profile Page
body: As an athlete, I want a public profile page with my bio and stats.

title: Embed Strava + Sponsor Content
body: As a user, I want to embed my Strava feed and sponsor logos.

title: Add NIL Booking Form
body: As a brand, I want to submit an NIL offer via the athlete's public page.

title: Brand Dashboard with Filters
body: As a brand, I want to search for athletes by sport and audience.

title: Offer Builder for Brands
body: As a brand, I want to build/send NIL offer packages to athletes.

title: Track Offer Status
body: As a brand, I want to track offer status and past deals.
